analyzed: citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna duka kusala ttika

original: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānam kusalam dhammam paṭicca no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno naakusalo
analyzed: citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānam akusalam dhammam paṭicca no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānaḥ na akusalaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi abyākata mūlam tīṇi yeva paccaya vasena
